titles.title: Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2005
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to modify the computation of eligibility for certain Federal Pell Grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: 6/13/2005--Introduced. Federal Pell Grant Eligibility Clarification Act of 2005 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to revise eligibility requirements for certain Pell Grant awards by modifying the formula for determining total income to include consideration of current year circumstances for students residing in states in which an extended benefit period under the Federal-State Extended Unemployment Compensation Act of 1970 is in effect, or would be effect if a specified circumstance applied.
